name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D CONCERT】Takanashi Kiara End Of The Year ⧸ Birthday Live 2023 小鳥遊キアラ生誕祭2023 #KFParty2023 [5LNv7CzFJgc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Takanashi Kiara and Natsuiro Matsuri perform 'Robot Kiss' on stage.
A brief transition period with a dark screen before the next performance.
Takanashi Kiara and Aki Rosenthal perform 'Ren'ai Circulation' on stage.

subtitles.original: ロボキッス
subtitles.english: Robot Kiss

subtitles.original: …は　できませ～ん
subtitles.english: ...I can't do it!

subtitles.original: シャバラララララララ～
subtitles.english: Shabaralalaralala

subtitles.original: シャバラララララララ～
subtitles.english: Shabaralalaralala

subtitles.original: シャバラララララララ～
subtitles.english: Shabaralalaralala

subtitles.original: シャバラララララララ～
subtitles.english: Shabaralalaralala

subtitles.original: シャバラララララララ～
subtitles.english: Shabaralalaralala

subtitles.original: シャバラララララララ～
subtitles.english: Shabaralalaralala

subtitles.original: シャバラララララララ～
subtitles.english: Shabaralalaralala

subtitles.original: ロボボッ
subtitles.english: Robobo

subtitles.original: キッス！
subtitles.english: Kiss!

subtitles.original: せーの
subtitles.english: One, two!

subtitles.original: でもそんなんじゃだめ
subtitles.english: But that's no good

subtitles.original: もうそんなんじゃほら
subtitles.english: Look, already like that

subtitles.original: 心は進化するよ　もっともっと
subtitles.english: The heart will evolve, more and more

subtitles.original: 恋愛サーキュレーション
subtitles.english: Ren'ai Circulation

subtitles.original: 言葉にすれば消えちゃう関係なら　言葉を消せばいいやって思ってた
subtitles.english: If it's a relationship that vanishes when put into words, I thought it'd be better to just erase the words

subtitles.original: 恐れてた　だけどあれ？なんか違うかも
subtitles.english: I was afraid, but wait? Something might be different

subtitles.original: 千里の道も一歩から　石のように固いそんな意志で
subtitles.english: A journey of a thousand miles starts with a single step, with a will as hard as a stone

subtitles.original: 塵も積もれば大和撫子？　「し」抜きで　いや「し」抜きで
subtitles.english: Even dust when piled up becomes a Yamato Nadeshiko? Without the "shi"... no, without the "shi"!

subtitles.original: ふわふわり　ふわふわる　あなたが名前を呼ぶ
subtitles.english: Softly floating, lightly drifting, you call my name

subtitles.original: それだけで宙へ浮かぶ
subtitles.english: Just that makes me float into space

subtitles.original: ふわふわる　ふわふわり　あなたが笑っている
subtitles.english: Lightly drifting, softly floating, you are smiling

subtitles.original: それだけで笑顔になる
subtitles.english: Just that makes me smile

subtitles.original: 神様ありがとう　運命のいたずらでも
subtitles.english: Thank you, God, even if it's a prank of fate

subtitles.original: めぐり逢えたことが　しあわせなの
subtitles.english: The fact that we could meet makes me happy

subtitles.original: でもそんなんじゃだめ
subtitles.english: But that's no good

subtitles.original: もうそんなんじゃほら
subtitles.english: Look, already like that

subtitles.original: 心は進化するよ　もっともっと
subtitles.english: The heart will evolve, more and more

subtitles.original: そうそんなんじゃやだ
subtitles.english: Yes, I don't want it like that

subtitles.original: ねぇそんなんじゃまだ
subtitles.english: Hey, it's not enough like that

subtitles.original: 私のこと見ててね　ずっとずっと
subtitles.english: Please keep watching me, forever and ever

subtitles.original: 私の中のあなたほど　あなたの中の私の存在はまだまだ
subtitles.english: As much as you are within me, my presence within you is still far from it

subtitles.original: 大きくないこともわかってるけれど
subtitles.english: I know it's not that big yet

subtitles.original: 今この同じ瞬間　共有してる時間
subtitles.english: Right now, this same moment, the time we are sharing

subtitles.original: 塵も積もれば大和撫子？　略してちりつもやまとなでこ！
subtitles.english: Even dust when piled up becomes a Yamato Nadeshiko? In short, Chiritsumo Yamato Nadeko!

subtitles.original: くらくらり　くらくらる　あなたを見上げたら
subtitles.english: Dizzy, spinning, when I look up at you

subtitles.original: それだけで眩しすぎて
subtitles.english: Just that is too dazzling

subtitles.original: くらくらる　くらくらり　あなたを想っている
subtitles.english: Spinning, dizzy, I am thinking of you

subtitles.original: それだけでとけてしまう
subtitles.english: Just that makes me melt away

subtitles.original: 神様ありがとう　運命のいたずらでも
subtitles.english: Thank you, God, even if it's a prank of fate

subtitles.original: めぐり逢えたことが　しあわせなの
subtitles.english: The fact that we could meet makes me happy

subtitles.original: 恋する季節は　欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The season of love is a greedy circulation

subtitles.original: 恋する季節は　欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The season of love is a greedy circulation

subtitles.original: 恋する気持ちは　欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The feeling of love is a greedy circulation

subtitles.original: 恋する気持ちは　欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The feeling of love is a greedy circulation

subtitles.original: 恋する瞳は　欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The eyes in love are a greedy circulation

subtitles.original: 恋する瞳は　欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The eyes in love are a greedy circulation

subtitles.original: 恋する乙女は　欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: A maiden in love is a greedy circulation

subtitles.original: 恋する乙女は　欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: A maiden in love is a greedy circulation

subtitles.english: Just that makes me float into space

subtitles.english: Lightly drifting, softly floating, you are smiling

subtitles.english: Just that makes me smile
